page.title: 17Shops
page.content: Three national{supermarkets}dominate the food trade.The newly built {Sainsbury/Bentall}complex enables shoppers to move from one store to another within the building.There remain only a few{grocers}and{bakers in the High Street with the odd general store in some housing areas. These are mostly later{19th}or early {20th}century buildings. Most of the national and regional {Estate Agents,Building Societies}and {Banks}are represented mainly in the very old listed buildings. Outfitters cater mainly for men.Ladies are served by only a few shops and Bentalls. Any style of furniture can be bought, from antique to modern. The{Do_it_yourself}enthusiast is provided with two very large shops.
